critique: The document pertains to the transfer of land and control in the Virgin Islands between the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of the Navy. It includes an exception for a specific area (east beach and bath-house) and stipulates that its use during seaplane operation will be governed by Navy Department regulations. The document itself doesn't directly address ideological issues, immigration, executive power, federalism, security vs. liberty, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most scores will be neutral.
